title: Animation Game
extended_details: There's a "stage" area visible by two webcams, one from the front and one from the side. Each person has a wand at the end of which is a colored LED. The 3D location of the wands is detected live using computer vision analyzing the webcam footage. Each wand is mapped to a body part: for example, one player could control the left foot, one the right foot, and the third player could control the head. Together, you can bring the character to life!
